summary: The diff implements all 13 requirements (REQ-53 through REQ-65) for per-stream live chat and viewer payment functionality. Backend changes include Channel.chatRoomId field, StreamerPayment type, sendTip/getPaymentsReceived/getPaymentsSent methods, and migration logic. Frontend implements StreamChatPanel, TipDialog, PaymentHistoryPage, useSendTip/usePaymentHistory hooks, routing, and navigation integration. All acceptance criteria appear satisfied based on the evidence in modified and new files.
